channel.title: CVE Feed for Trumani -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trumani -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-24245|2024-08-03T19:21:18.707Z -- trumani -- stop%20spammers
item.description: The Stop Spammers WordPress plugin before 2021.9 did not escape user input when blocking requests (such as matching a spam word), outputting it in an attribute after sanitising it to remove HTML tags, which is not sufficient and lead to a reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue.
